title: [Lava Flows, Sulfurous Path]
description: A curtain of pale vapor rolls downhill from the valley's northern ridge.  The odor of rotten eggs is overpowering, and mingling tendrils of smoke leave throats raw and eyes burning.
A curtain of pale yellow vapor rolls downhill from the valley's northern ridge.  The odor of rotten eggs is overpowering, and mingling tendrils of grey smoke leave throats raw and eyes burning.
